title: 1. FC Union Berlin - Wikipedia
snippet: The club's origins can be traced to 1906, when its predecessor FC Olympia Oberschöneweide was founded. During the Cold War, Union was based in East Berlin, joining the German league structure upon the reunification of the city and country in 1990. From 2009 until 2019, they competed in the 2.

title: Newly promoted Union Berlin is a model club in Germany
snippet: Union Berlin is 100% fan member owned. This means that there are no outside investors with the team. These fans previously helped raise money for the club during tough times by donating blood.

title: 1. FC Union Berlin - history and facts
snippet: Founded: 1966 (1906) Country: Germany City: Berlin ... FC Union Berlin was founded in 1966, but its pre-history goes all way back to 1906 when its forerunner FC Olympia Oberschöneweide was funded – that is one of many clubs that Union Berlin has its root in.
